entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
